ref: 3309 kumbha2 m.n., ˚bhā -- , ˚bhī -- , ˚bhikā -- f. ʻ names of various plants ʼ lex.
Pa. kumbhī -- f. ʻ name of a plant (= kumudikā -- ) ʼ;
S. khūmbhaṭu m. ʻ a plant growing in the Tharu ʼ;
Or. kumbhi ʻ a wild tree with big white flowers and big fruits and fibrous bark for ropes ʼ;
H. kū̃bh m., kumbi, khu˚, kumri, gumar f. ʻ the tree Careya arborea ʼ;
M. khũbhā m., ˚bhī f. ʻ a wild tree with thick leaves and bark used for making ropes ʼ, kũphaḷ n. ʻ its fruit ʼ (< kũbh -- phaḷ?).
